page.title: 13HOUSING 2
page.content: The owner-occupied{Burford Estate were better cared for and therefore looked never. Welland was only completed, however, about seven years ago. There are also 2 mobile home parks in our area- Keys and Tasman parks. Tasman has been there for about 37 years starting off with 7 old caravans on a disused farm. Keys park is much larger with 79 mobile homes. Each has a colourful,well-kept garden. There is even a pond and fountain. The park was bright, friendly and cheerful and has been there for twenty years. It is owned by Godfrey Davin park homes. People live here because it is cheaper then buying a house. Everything necessary is provided except a fridge, washing machine, hoover and personal things such as ornaments, sheets etc....
